verses.name: Proverbs 15:18
verses.text: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:19
verses.text: The way of the slothful man is as an hedge of thorns: but the way of the righteous is made plain.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:20
verses.text: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:21
verses.text: Folly is joy to him that is destitute of wisdom: but a man of understanding walketh uprightly.

verses.name: Proverbs 15:22
verses.text: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.
